price: 90 Et s’il est du nombre des gens de la droite,
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna min aṣḥābi al-yamīni
